patthana16.51:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetu
patthana16.51:1.1_1: nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha
patthana16.51:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
